oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Vier Jahre ökologischer Anbau landwirtschaftlicher Kulturen – Erträge und Qualitäten im Vergleich –
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Seddig, S.
Jansen, G.
Balko, C.
Jürgens, H.-U.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Crop health, quality, protection
Cereals, pulses and oilseeds
Root crops
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The quality of agricultural products grown organically or conventionally under the same environmental conditions is extensively investigated and compared over several years. Investigations should result in statements about the suitability of varieties for the production of specific qualities and the possibility of their improvement in organic farming.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Seddig, S.; Jansen, G.; Balko, C. and Jürgens, H.-U. (2007) Vier Jahre ökologischer Anbau landwirtschaftlicher Kulturen – Erträge und Qualitäten im Vergleich –. [Four years organic farming of agricultural crops – yields and qualities in comparison –.] Poster at: Zwischen Tradition und Globalisierung - 9. Wissenschaftstagung Ökologischer Landbau, Universität Hohenheim, Stuttgart, Deutschland, 20.-23.03.2007.
